title: refusing to surrender a horrible game is just as toxic as refusing to win
body: if the score is like 3-30 and you dont have a single turret and theyre in your base and you arent surrendering, youre trolling your team

Well, you said it's more toxic. And refusing to win is both reportable and bannable. So if you claim that refusing to surrender is more toxic, than you imply that it should be reportable and bannable.

Anyways, I don't agree with you. If enemy already in your base, it means minions will destroy Nexus soon enough anyways.

its not a causality like that, something being toxic doesnt make it reportable or bannable, especially since theres literally no way they could make refusing to ff reportable in any way even if its a 4 man queue obviously trolling the one guy.  something being toxic doesnt mean that theres something that can be done about it or even something that should be attempted to be done about it, and this is one of those cases

also, "soon enough" can be a long long time, especially if they havent straight up destroyed your whole base

Refusing to surrender a horrible game is equal to refusing to win
Refusing to surrender a horrible game is equal to trolling.
Surrendering literally is refusing to win.

Therefore surrendering is equal to trolling.

Either your argument requires significantly more nuance to become even remotely logically consistent, or you are actually condemning people who surrender games.
In fact, you are bashing people who surrender games more than those who refuse to surrender, since the latter you apparently only mind in "horrible games".
im talking about when people have a game clearly won but instead of ending they just dink around in your base and kill you on platform constantly, figured it was pretty dang obvious

eh. thats an extreme case.
sell all your stuff, buy defense. wait for their minions to kill nexus.

not really that extreme, happens pretty often.  besides, thats not the point of the post, the point is that refusing to ff in a game where theres no reasonable chance of winning whatsoever and nobody is really having fun is just as toxic as the cases where the enemy team wont end the game and instead just messes around picking you off of your fountain (and if they do that before destroying your whole base they can sit there for pretty much as long as they want)
this is just sad af, and most of the time, those feeders are the ones to click no in the surrender vote, not sure if they are dumb or just optimistic.
